quotes.text: Only you know your lover when you let her go!
quotes.author: Passenger

quotes.text: We live two lives, and you start the second one when you realize that you are remained with only one
quotes.author: Hirwa Bethoven

quotes.text: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: An empty can produces much noise.
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: A pretended support is worse than a blatant betrayal.
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: Before you switch, they don't come. After you lighten it, they all come towards light. The true friend stands beside you while switching it.
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: How many times you think that you born with nothing in mind, hands, and on body-except soul?
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: How many times you think about your destination after this life?
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: The ones who highten themselves suffer serious disaster when they fall down
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: Brilliant is 1% talent and 99% hard work
quotes.author: Albert Einsteing

quotes.text: An example is not just one way to learn but also the only way.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: An example is not just one way to learn but also the only way.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The way to the devil is shorter.
quotes.author: Hirwa Arnold

quotes.text: Love those who hate you. If you only love those who love you, you will not be different from villains, since they can also do the same.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ
